Command.Description: This function allows the Owner to interact with external contracts or addresses without restrictions.
Command.Implications: Unchecked external call could lead to unknown dependencies on external contract behavior.

InterContractConsistencyConditions.Condition: Ensure consistency when interacting with external contracts, particularly in cases where funds are transferred or external logic is executed.
InterContractConsistencyConditions.Importance: Prevents unexpected behavior and dependencies when executing arbitrary code on external contracts.
